author: luoxi
en_content: {"blocks":[{"key":"e862g","text":"I hope writing a blog can help me live a better life. I’ve never really been someone who knows how to enjoy life. By writing a blog and recording a more refined lifestyle, I can motivate and push myself to live better in order to write more blogs.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":247,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"10lo8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6u31p","text":"Reflecting on 2024, I realized that I traveled to Chengdu four times within three months. I don’t even know how many times my ex emotionally pulled me back and forth during this period, but I am grateful that this short journey allowed me to grow.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":247,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7vn9q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cfebp","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"d6p28","text":"Smile Plz","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":9,"style":"BOLD"},{"offset":0,"length":9,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"c3cfm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"892jc","text":"In January, I went to ByteDance in Beijing for an internship. My job there was to review data for large language models, focusing especially on code-related data. Essentially, It was the process of supervised fine-tuning (SFT). This job feels very monotonous in practice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":271,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"638t5","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":1}],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"317cd","text":"ByteDance’s Feishu","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":18,"style":"BOLD"},{"offset":0,"length":18,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"571c8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bbqq4","text":"In February, I went to Japan with my elder sister. I still remember the time when I was very young and visited a toy store in Ginza, Tokyo, begging my mom to buy me some Yu-Gi-Oh cards. All I recall is the layout of the place and the fact that it was in Ginza. Using this little memory, I went back to this toy store, and I ended up buying a bunch of Yu-Gi-Oh cards. Pretty clever of me that I have a great memory, right?","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":421,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dtud5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"53vtm","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":2}],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"8s66c","text":"Those Yu-Gi-Oh Packages","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":23,"style":"BOLD"},{"offset":0,"length":23,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"a1ti5","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":3}],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"638d7","text":"Senso-ji Temple and the World Tree","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":34,"style":"BOLD"},{"offset":0,"length":34,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"a0drr","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":4}],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"3nabp","text":"Took a selfie in Kamakura before Escaping the pouring rain","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":58,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"},{"offset":0,"length":58,"style":"BOLD"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"fdisa","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"79bfh","text":"In March, I went back to Melbourne to continue my studies. During this time, I went skydiving. I also finished my final semester’s coursework, which really helped me organize my knowledge systematically. I gradually became more confident: I can use open-source code, adapt it to new environments, and modify or add parts of the code to meet new demands. I learned how to build websites. Given enough time, I’m confident I can implement many features on my website. These have become the sources of my confidence in job hunting.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":527,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4iof9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"44hb7","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":5}],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"6je93","text":"Skydiving over the Great Ocean Road","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":35,"style":"BOLD"},{"offset":0,"length":35,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"9tgp8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2ult4","text":"In June, after graduating, I went on a road trip near Melbourne. My travel planning was truly on point—this was a fun and happy trip, and I didn’t bring my laptop for once (because I’m more of a workaholic who brings a laptop on most of my vacations.).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":252,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d5an9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"afrb5","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":6}],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"dbq7f","text":"Graduation！！！！","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":14,"style":"BOLD"},{"offset":0,"length":14,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"4hgnm","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":7}],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"667jt","text":"Meditating on a seaside cliff. --- Philip Island","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":48,"style":"BOLD"},{"offset":0,"length":48,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"9gfa2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3kqv5","text":"After that road trip, over the course of a month, I had several job interviews. In the following few months, I started frantically coding. During my internship, I built a system for automating proposals for bids. Given a Request for Proposal (RFP) and the company’s background, it would automatically draft the proposal.  I wrote both the front-end and back-end by myself—really gave me a thorough workout. And that’s pretty much how my year went by.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":450,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8b7o8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5dvrg","text":"These past few days, I’ve been working on my personal Chatbot. Currently, there are two main ways to build a Chatbot: 1) Fine-tuning, 2) Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG). Previously, I mainly used LangChain for retrieval augmentation. These past few days, I wrote a few hundred prompts to attempt fine-tuning, but I found that the model’s performance wasn’t great—it kept making things up. So I plan to combine fine-tuning with RAG to build my Chatbot. (Notes: Shh... The most tedious part is writing all the prompts.)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":522,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5dvki","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2rucq","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":8}],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"7kgsb","text":"Embracing the sea on the last day of 2024","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":41,"style":"BOLD"},{"offset":0,"length":41,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"b527e","text":"I’ll write some interesting little stories in the coming blog posts. There are so many fun stories, and I’m afraid I’ll forget them if I don’t write them down.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":159,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dksam","text":"2025, Let's wait and see!","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":25,"style":"BOLD"},{"offset":0,"length":25,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"bifn7","text":"To be continued...","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":18,"style":"BOLD"},{"offset":0,"length":18,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"IMAGE","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"src":"https://api.xiluo.net/get_blog_img/20250101100929.jpeg","height":"400px","width":"300px"}},"1":{"type":"IMAGE","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"src":"https://api.xiluo.net/get_blog_img/20250101101045.jpeg","height":"375px","width":"500px"}},"2":{"type":"IMAGE","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"src":"https://api.xiluo.net/get_blog_img/20250101101200.jpeg","height":"375px","width":"500px"}},"3":{"type":"IMAGE","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"src":"https://api.xiluo.net/get_blog_img/20250101101219.jpeg","height":"500px","width":"375px"}},"4":{"type":"IMAGE","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"src":"https://api.xiluo.net/get_blog_img/20250101101231.jpeg","height":"375px","width":"450px"}},"5":{"type":"IMAGE","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"src":"https://api.xiluo.net/get_blog_img/20250101101245.jpeg","height":"405px","width":"540px"}},"6":{"type":"IMAGE","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"src":"https://api.xiluo.net/get_blog_img/20250101101259.jpeg","height":"428px","width":"570px"}},"7":{"type":"IMAGE","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"src":"https://api.xiluo.net/get_blog_img/20250101101316.jpeg","height":"600px","width":"450px"}},"8":{"type":"IMAGE","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"src":"https://api.xiluo.net/get_blog_img/20250101101328.jpeg","height":"375px","width":"500px"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2gt8n","text":"我希望写博客能让我把生活过得更好，","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":17,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"og0","text":"我不是一个很懂得生活的人，一直都不是，","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":19,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"c6j3","text":"所以我尝试着把自己架起来，","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":13,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"da9c9","text":"push自己把自己的生活过得更好。","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":17,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"eiqku","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"8p3ot","text":"回顾2024，","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":7,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"44v7a","text":"发现自己在三个月内往成都跑了四趟，","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":17,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"2f54j","text":"三个月我都不知道被拉扯了多少次，","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":16,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"e0egp","text":"但还是我很感激在这一小段旅程让我成长。","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":19,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"f2klm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"2et42","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"b6pd5","text":"Smile Plz","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":9,"style":"BOLD"},{"offset":0,"length":9,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"37ka8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"as9be","text":"很多人有戾气，","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":7,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"erbsm","text":"这种戾气或者攻击性，","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":10,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"5o060","text":"形成在于自己无法达到目的，生活不如意，","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":19,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"b8hnm","text":"所形成的保护机制。","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":9,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"4iqbj","text":"至少我在她身上感觉不到一丝戾气。","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":16,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"1ot9f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"2uuhk","text":"我可以舍弃很多世俗的优点，","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":13,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"1og3s","text":"仅仅换取一个没有戾气和性格好的人。","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":17,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"6upde","text":"但是回过头来，也会发现，","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":12,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"7h9c4","text":"只有在世俗上有很多优点的人，","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":14,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"bdgil","text":"才会没有戾气，而且性格好，","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":13,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"6fhrl","text":"因为世俗可以让他们生活如意，","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":14,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"dsfj","text":"戾气就自然少。","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":7,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"bvsv9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"985pg","text":"我曾经用自己的热情，","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":10,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"b1vkf","text":"尝试化解一些戾气，","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":9,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"26au4","text":"反过来自己却感染上无数的戾气，","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":15,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"duqv6","text":"逐渐变得有攻击性起来。","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":11,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"4g7ud","text":"我的解决办法是把戾气都一键删除了，","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":17,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"8cefq","text":"这些废物和垃圾就该被删除。","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":13,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text- en_summary: I hope writing a blog can help me live a better life. I’ve never really been someone who knows how to enjoy life. By writing a blog and recording a more refined lifestyle, I can motivate and push myself to live better in order to write more blogs. Reflecting on...
cn_summary: 我希望写博客能让我把生活过得更好， 我不是一个很懂得生活的人，一直都不是， 所以我尝试着把自己架起来， push自己把自己的生活过得更好。  回顾2024， 发现自己在三个月内往成都跑了四趟， 三个月我都不知道被拉扯了多少次， 但还是我很感激在这一小段旅程让我成长。    Smile Plz  很多...
